description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class representing the current state of a chess game, used in API responses.

classes.name: GameStateResponse
classes.description: A response DTO class that encapsulates the state of a chess game, including identifiers, status, players, position, move history, move count, and timestamp.

methods.name: GameStateResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an empty game state response object.

methods.name: GameStateResponse
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing the response object with all game state details.
